ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I still consider it a joke because it s just basically a big targeted DD.  Yes it can save you from time to time, but because the damage it does is
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 24 Mar 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
>
> hehe John, I run an SK, used right, HT is FAR from a joke. It's a very
> useful skill. Unfortunately it gets !?!resisted!?! a lot (something SK's
> bitch about regularly). Dirge is a joke because it pisses off everything
> around you (300hp tends to do that) and doesn't kill anything.

I still consider it a joke because it's just basically a big
targeted DD. Yes it can save you from time to time, but
because the damage it does is (usually) small relative to the
hp a creature has, it doesn't turn the tide of a battle (well,
maybe at low levels it does). Lay Hands OTOH basically
doubles the lifetime of one member of your party.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
